attributes.name: InKindDonation
attributes.description:
An `InKindDonation` record represents a non-cash gift given to an `Organization` at a specific time.

These include items like furniture, vehicles, services, or stocks. `InKindDonations` do not trigger
acknowledgment letter emails via the API â€” these must be sent from the Giving Admin UI.

[More info](https://pcogiving.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040772154-In-kind-donations#enter-an-in-kind-donation-0)

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique identifier for an in-kind donation.

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description:
The date and time at which an in-kind donation was created.

Example: `2000-01-01T12:00:00Z`

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description:
The date and time at which an in-kind donation was last updated.

Example: `2000-01-01T12:00:00Z`

attributes.name: description
attributes.description:
Required. Brief description of an in-kind donation gift.

Example: `2019 Toyota Corolla (used)`

attributes.name: exchange_details
attributes.description:
Optional. Records whether any goods or services were exchanged for an in-kind donation.

Example: `In exchange, a charity event ticket for $100 was provided.`

attributes.name: fair_market_value_cents
attributes.description: Optional. The fair market value of an in-kind donation in cents. Must be greater than $0 and less than or equal to $21,000,000.

attributes.name: received_on
attributes.description:
Required. The date an in-kind donation was received.

Format: `YYYY-MM-DD` (e.g. `2025-04-09`).

attributes.name: valuation_details
attributes.description: Optional. The fair market for an in-kind donation which should be determined by donors and appraisers. Maximum 255 characters. Example: `Appraised by Bob Johnson CPA (123 Easy Street, Carlsbad CA 92008)`

attributes.name: acknowledgment_last_sent_at
attributes.description: The timestamp of when the acknowledgment letter was last sent for this in-kind donation. This value is set automatically and cannot be manually changed.

attributes.name: campus
attributes.note: `Campus` is automatically assigned based on the donor's primary campus. If you pass an explicit value (a relationship reference or `null`), it will override the default.

attributes.name: campus
attributes.description: include associated campus

attributes.name: fund
attributes.description: include associated fund

attributes.name: person
attributes.description: include associated person

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-created_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: received_on
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-received_on) to reverse the order

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-updated_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: campus_id
attributes.description: `Campus` is automatically assigned based on the donor's primary campus. If you pass an explicit value (a relationship reference or `null`), it will override the default.

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Query on a specific created_at

attributes.name: fund_id
attributes.description: `Fund` is required.

attributes.name: received_on
attributes.description: Query on a specific received_on

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Query on a specific updated_at

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: get results from given offset
